content: Who can answer this, whare to get trusted dapp payment app for a website?The ones that allow connection with metamask / coinbase/ ronin etc

comments.author: KiranKBS
comments.body: Quote from: btctalk-memeboss on June 13, 2023, 10:49:34 PMWho can answer this, whare to get trusted dapp payment app for a website?The ones that allow connection with metamask / coinbase/ ronin etcIt depends on your requirement!For example, you can use Uniswap React Widget for Website or iframe. You can also try Volt Inu Swap.If you are looking for wallet provider integration try out Connect Wallet Widget.
